file.tsx(12,9): error TS2454: Variable 'condition1' is used before being assigned.


==== file.tsx (1 errors) ====
    /// <reference path="/.lib/react.d.ts" />
    
    import React = require('react');
    
    interface ComponentProps {
        property1: string;
        property2: number;
    }
    
    export default function Component(props: ComponentProps) {
        let condition1: boolean;
        if (condition1) {
            ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2454: Variable 'condition1' is used before being assigned.
            return (
                <ChildComponent {...props} />
            );
        }
        else {
            return (<ChildComponent {...props} property1="NewString" />);
        }
    }
    
    interface AnotherComponentProps {
        property1: string;
    }
    
    function ChildComponent({ property1 }: AnotherComponentProps) {
        return (
            <span>{property1}</span>
        );
    }
